name: PyroNinja: Fire Dodge
description: A ninja (Flame) has found himself in a volcano and must dodge fireballs and collect coins to survive. There are three modes, Timed Dodge, Coin Grab and Challenges. In Timed Dodge you must survive for as long as possible. In Coin Grab you must collect as many coins as possible. In Challenges you must complete increasingly more difficult challenges based on the other two modes.
